channel.title: [pi] server cmd started saying this
channel.description:
so when i log out the client screen freezes and the server cmd says this. the player char file will save and all but it freezes and you have to restart client for you to log back on.
[code]acket(ClickingButtons.java:638) [10/17/10 12:48 AM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:138) [10/17/10 12:48 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:970) [10/17/10 12:48 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:136) [10/17/10 12:48 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:151) [10/17/10 12:48 AM]: Caused by: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsEx ception: Communications link failure

can anybody help me fix it?

item.title: [pi] server cmd started saying this
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Alrighty, well the problem is fixed so I see no need for this topic to remain open.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] server cmd started saying this
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

oh i figured it out. i added highscores to forums and i took it off so it couldnt find the link or whatever. i fixed it:) this can be closed now.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] server cmd started saying this
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Looks like it can’t establish a connection.

Just comment out the MySQL connector from the Server’s initialize method inside the Server class.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] server cmd started saying this
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Something is wrong with your SQL!

Read full topic
